resources.string: Enter a link of online Recipe

string-array.name: food_ingredient
string-array.item:
Ingredients:
 3-4 ripe kiwifruit, peeled, carefully chopped 
1/4 cup pomegranate seeds (arils)
 1/2 avocado, peeled and chopped (see how to cut and peel an avocado )1 heaping tablespoon thinly sliced green onion 1 tablespoon (adjust to taste) of chopped fresh or pickled jalapeño chili peppers (no seeds)

Ingredients: 
1 can (13.8 oz) Pillsbury™ refrigerated classic pizza crust Save $ 
1/2 cup coarsely chopped bacon (3 slices) Save $ 
6 eggs, beaten Save $ 
4 oz (half of 8-oz package) cream cheese, cut into small pieces Save $ 
2 cups shredded Monterey Jack cheese with jalapeño peppers (8 oz)

Ingredients: 
8 cups cold water 
 ½ cup corn syrup ((can sub 1/3 cup sugar)) 
3 tablespoons salt 
1 teaspoon white vinegar 
 6 large Russet potatoes (About 4.5 pounds)

Ingredients: 
 2 cups vegetable oil (for frying) 
 3 plantains (green, unripe) 
1 tablespoon garlic paste 
6 ounces pork rinds or cracklings (crushed)
Ingredients ¼ to ½ tsp red chili powder ((less spicy variety like kashmiri or byadgi)) ¼ tsp salt ( as needed) ¼ tsp turmeric ½ tsp garam masala powder 1/8 tsp pepper powder
Ingredients 2 large eggs Water 4 cups chicken broth 2 packs instant ramen 4 ounces peeled and deveined shrimp

Ingredients 8 ounces uncooked linguine 1 Half Stick (1/4 cup) Land O Lakes® Butter with Olive Oil Sea Salt 2 teaspoons finely chopped fresh garlic 1/2 teaspoon dried parsley flakes 1/2 cup dry white wine *

Ingredients 
2 lbs chicken thighs (boneless and skinless) 
½ cup Greek yogurt (plain) 
2 tbsp lemon juice 
2 tbsp red wine vinegar 
2 tbsp olive oil

Ingredients 
6 Mint Leaves (+ for garnish) 
2 shots White Rum 
1 shot Lime Juice 
1-2 shots Orange Juice ((Freshly Squeezed)) 
 Soda Water (/ Sparkling Water)

Ingredients 
6 Mint Leaves (+ for garnish) 
2 shots White Rum 
1 shot Lime Juice 
1-2 shots Orange Juice ((Freshly Squeezed)) 
Soda Water (/ Sparkling Water)

Ingredients 
24 whole shrimp (raw) 
1 whole onion (finely chopped) 
1/2 cup avocado oil 
1 tbsp lemon zest 
3 cloves garlic (minced)

Ingredients 
1 1/2 cups peach nectar 
1 banana (halved) 
1 1/2 cups frozen peaches 
1/2 cup frozen mango 
3/4 cup vanilla Greek yogurt

Ingredients 
20 garlic cloves 
1 bunch cilantro, trimmed 
1 cup loosely packed fresh oregano leaves 
5 tablespoons kosher salt 
2 tablespoons black pepper

Ingredients 
2 Salmon fillets 
1 1/2 tbsp olive oil (divided) 
4 cloves garlic (minced) 
1 tsp dried oregano 
1/2 tsp paprika

Ingredients 
2 pounds boneless chicken breasts (cut into strips) 
1/3 cup Louisiana style hot sauce 
1/2 cup buttermilk 
Peanut oil to fill a deep fryer 
2/3 cup all purpose flour
